pr_title: DHFPROD-6073: Middle-tier Endpoint For Default Mastering Collections

timeline.bodyText: @fsnow  @ryanjdew  Do you anticipate having other endpoints specific to the concept of mastering? I'm wondering if these collections are specific to matching or merging and thus should be in the Matching or Merging step controller.
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: This will be used for populating the defaults to the merge step, so it could go under merging. I can't think of anything at the moment that couldn't be split between matching or merging.
replies.author: ryanjdew

replies.bodyText: We don't have a MatchingController or MergingController in that directory, so it would be a rename of this one.
replies.author: fsnow

replies.bodyText: @fsnow I think this should go into MergingStepController then, as it's specific to a merging step.
replies.author: rjrudin

timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.message: DHFPROD-6073: Middle-tier Endpoint For Default Mastering Collections
